meanings.definition: The act of reflecting or the state of being reflected.
meanings.sent1: His reflexions on the book helped him understand it better.
meanings.sent2: She sat quietly, lost in reflexions about her past.
meanings.sent3: His reflexions on the situation were so deep, he almost missed his stop on the bus.
meanings.sent4: The lake's surface showed clear reflexions of the surrounding trees.
meanings.sent5: In the mirror, she saw her reflexions staring back at her.

meanings.sent1: After much reflexions, he decided to take the job offer.
meanings.sent2: Her reflexions on the matter led her to a wise decision.
meanings.sent3: His reflexions on what to have for lunch were comically intense.
meanings.sent4: In the quiet of the night, her reflexions were like whispers in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The reflexions of the consequences made him hesitate.

meanings.definition: An image or likeness produced by reflection.
meanings.sent1: The reflexions in the mirror made the room seem larger.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the reflexions of the sunset on the water perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The reflexions in the glass distorted his face in a funny way.
meanings.sent4: Her smile in the reflexions seemed brighter than in reality.
meanings.sent5: The reflexions of the mountains in the lake were breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A remark or comment made in response to something.
meanings.sent1: His reflexions on the topic added depth to the conversation.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated his reflexions on her presentation.
meanings.sent3: His reflexions on the joke made everyone laugh even harder.
meanings.sent4: The professor's reflexions on the student's essay were insightful.
meanings.sent5: Her reflexions on the movie were met with agreement from her friends.
